doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Nilanthilage Amila Sudarshana Silva Vs Hon. Attorney General before Hon.R.P. Hettiarachchi, J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Nilanthilage Amila Sudarshana Silva Vs Hon. Attorney General
latest_doc_d.keywords: Rape- Incest- Grave Sexual Abuse-Convicting for a lesser offence- Mitigatory grounds-Aggravating Circumstances
latest_doc_d.legistation: Sections 364A(1), 364A (3), 365B2(b) of the Penal Code (as amended ) - Sections 177 and 333 (5) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Code Act No. 15 of 1979 (as amended)
